While The Game Does Have Some Matchmaking Issues (i.e. Getting put against people who are smurfing) The Core Gameplay Is Well Done. It Gets The Message Across That It Is A Realistic Shooter And Lead To Some Really Memorable Moments With My Friends. I Keep Coming Back To This Game Because Of All The Great Moments I Have Had With My Friends And Of All The Moments My Friends And I Will Keep Making.
